name: Recoup Oneself
description:
This game was built for Weekly Game Jam 210 The theme was fragments Decided to try to solo this game jam even if I have little experience with them. I probably won't try this again. It was an interesting experience.

As the main piece go around the level to collect fellow pieces around the level but make sure not to hit the wall.

Controls:

Rotate - Q,E

Move - W,A,S,D

Zoom - Space

Pause - ESC

Download Instructions

Download, unzip and run.
